sn35.15:1.3: Yavata cakkhussa assado pannaya me so sudittho.
sn35.15:1.6: Yavata cakkhussa adinavo pannaya me so sudittho.
sn35.15:1.9: Yavata cakkhussa nissaranam, pannaya me tam sudittham.
sn35.15:1.14: Yavata jivhaya assado pannaya me so sudittho.
sn35.15:1.17: Yavata jivhaya adinavo pannaya me so sudittho.
sn35.15:1.20: Yavata jivhaya nissaranam, pannaya me tam sudittham …pe…
sn35.15:1.23: Yavata manassa assado pannaya me so sudittho.
sn35.15:1.26: Yavata manassa adinavo pannaya me so sudittho.
sn35.15:1.29: Yavata manassa nissaranam, pannaya me tam sudittham.
sn35.15:2.1: Yavakivancaham, bhikkhave, imesam channam ajjhattikanam ayatananam assadanca assadato, adinavanca adinavato, nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam nabbhannasim …pe…
sn35.15:2.4: ‘akuppa me vimutti, ayamantima jati, natthi dani punabbhavo’”ti.
